channel.title: [Code] Insert new line in subtitle ?
channel.description:
Hello there! I have done translating the game to Arabic language for a along time. Sadly the game doesn't support Arabic from right to left. But that's okay, there is some method I can do to make it work. To let this method work, I need to know what is the code I should write/use in subtitle file, to make insert new line in the game. Without it is quite impossible to make Arabic language work in long sentences. That's why I need to make them short sentences.
I really need your help :slight_smile:
Thanks!

Hi there, thanks for reaching out. I unfortunately don’t know of any code that makes a line break in the close caption code.
I have also checked the Valve developer wiki, and found nothing.

I know translations take a lot of work, so I am really sorry for this inconvenience. It just doesn’t look like there is anything that we can do about it at this point.
